      public DBAppointments()

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()
      Gets all rows from the appointments table of the database and creates an Appointments object for each row. The objects are then added to an ObservableList for use elsewhere in the application.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList aList containing objects for all appointments.

    • getThisMonthAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getThisMonthAppts()
      Gets all appointments from the database that have a date within the current month of the current year and creates an Appointments object for each row. The objects are then added to an ObservableList for use elsewhere in the application.
      Returns:
      ObservableList currMonthAppts containing the objects for the retrieved list of appointments.

    • getThisWeekAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getThisWeekAppts()
      Gets all appointments from the database that have a date within the current week of the current year and creates an Appointments object for each row. The objects are then added to an ObservableList for use elsewhere in the application.
      Returns:
      ObservableList currWeekAppts containing the objects for the retrieved list of appointments.

    • getApptsByUserID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getApptsByUserID(int user)
      Gets all appointments from the database that have a user_id matching the value passed to the method and creates an Appointments object for each row. The objects are then added to an ObservableList for use elsewhere in the application.
      Returns:
      ObservableList userAppts containing the objects for the retrieved list of appointments.

    • getApptsByCustID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getApptsByCustID(int customerID)
      Gets all appointments from the database that have a customer_id matching the value passed to the method and creates an Appointments object for each row. The objects are then added to an ObservableList for use elsewhere in the application.
      Returns:
      ObservableList custAppts containing the objects for the retrieved list of appointments.

    • getApptsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getApptsByContact(int contactID)
      Gets all appointments from the database that have a contact_id matching the value passed to the method and creates an Appointments object for each row. The objects are then added to an ObservableList for use elsewhere in the application.
      Returns:
      ObservableList contactAppts containing the objects for the retrieved list of appointments.

    • addAppointment

      public static int addAppointment(Appointments appointmentToAdd)
      Takes an Appointments object passed from the Add Appointment screen, extracts its values, and adds a new row to the appointments table of the database populated with these values. After the appointment is generated in the database, the ID for the appointment is returned and stored in the newApptID variable.
      Parameters:
      appointmentToAdd - the Appointments object passed in from the Add Appointments screen.
      Returns:
      int newApptID - the ID for the new appointment as auto-generated by the database.

    • modifyAppointment

      public static void modifyAppointment(Appointments appointmentToMod)
      Takes an Appointments object passed from the Modify Appointment screen, extracts its values, and updates the corresponding database row with these values.
      Parameters:
      appointmentToMod - the Appointments object passed in from the Modify Appointment screen.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static boolean deleteAppointment(int apptID)
      Deletes appointment matching the appointment ID passed in from the main screen.
      Parameters:
      apptID - the appointment ID to be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean isDeleted - true if the appointment was successfully deleted, false if it was not.

    • deleteApptsByCust

      public static void deleteApptsByCust(int custID)
      Deletes all appointments matching the customer ID passed in from the main screen. Used when deleting a customer that has existing appointments.
      Parameters:
      custID - the ID of the customer to be deleted.

    • getApptsByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getApptsByMonth()
      Gets the month, and year of all appointments from the database and counts the number containing each month. A for loop controls which month the method searches the database for on each pass. Each result is then added into a string for later use.
      Returns:
      ObservableList apptsByMonth, containing all the strings generated from the database query results.

    • getApptTypesByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Types> getApptTypesByMonth()
      Gets the appointment type of all appointments from the database and counts the number of each type per month. A for loop controls which month the method searches the database for on each pass. Each result is then added into a string for later use.
      Returns:
      ObservableList apptTypesByMonth, containing all the strings generated from the database query results.
